column1: Baby Barnaby's////The inside is painted with fun childhood colors that made me think that either I was in Wonderland
column2: or a very bad 70's throwback smoke shop. Either way
column3: it was whimsical and fun to look at with the side of eggs they serve up. The tables are tightly jammed together due to the small space and conversations should be kept to the non-personal variety unless you like uninvited breakfast guests eavesdropping about what you discuss.
